text: ยง 6-208 Copies of franchise resolutions and contracts to be filed in certain offices and to be public records. Within five days after the final execution of any contract made pursuant to chapter fourteen of the charter, a copy of such contract, together with the resolution authorizing the same, duly attested by the secretary of the board of estimate, shall be transmitted to each of the following: the comptroller, the commissioner of finance, the corporation counsel, the city clerk, the commissioner of transportation and the public service commission, to be preserved by them in the archives of their departments or offices. All such certified copies shall be deemed to be public records.

heading.catch_text: Copies of franchise resolutions and contracts to be filed in certain offices and to be public records.
